dc_description_s: point features showing towns   mountains from the Mongolian steppe southward across Inner Mongolia, Qinghai and Kham;  digitized from P.K. Kozlov "Map of Mongolia and Kham"  1899-1901  CHGIS V4 also provides supplemental datasets, including points derived from Russian Historical Maps, and other features that have been developed or processed from publicly available sources for use with CHGIS layers. -- text from CHGIS v4 CD-ROM.
dc_subject_sm: towns and natural features, Mongolia and Tibet
